events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and are excited to review your qualifications in detail.
Your application was categorized under the engineering department based on your skills and experience in software development.
A recruiter from our engineering hiring team has been assigned to assist you throughout the recruitment process.
We completed the initial screening and were impressed by your software engineering background and projects.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the next step in our engineering interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our lead engineer for March 20th at 2 PM UTC to discuss your coding skills.
The technical interview was successfully completed, and the interviewers appreciated your problem-solving abilities and coding proficiency.
We have scheduled your HR interview for March 23rd at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits in detail.
Your HR interview went well, and you were very positive about the company's mission and work environment.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the software engineer role with a competitive salary and benefits package.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer. We’re glad to hear that the terms are satisfactory.
You have formally accepted our offer. We look forward to having you join our engineering team soon.
Your onboarding process has started, and we’ve scheduled all necessary sessions for you to integrate seamlessly into the engineering team.
The hiring process is now officially closed. We’re excited to welcome you onboard as a new software engineer.
